sentences.sCn: 搓或纺织在一起，使交织。

sentences.sContent: Riparian zone was an important interlace or eco-tone between aquatic ecosystems and upland ecosystems.
sentences.sContent_eng: Riparian zone was an important interlace or eco-tone between aquatic ecosystems and upland ecosystems.
sentences.sCn: 湖滨带是水生和陆地生态系统间的过渡带或生态交错区。

sentences.sContent: Dynamic geometries interlace the many spaces with 3 dimensional curves ensuring that the project cannot be comprehended from one single vantage point.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dynamic geometries interlace the many spaces with 3 dimensional curves ensuring that the project cannot be comprehended from one single vantage point.
sentences.sCn: 动态几何图形和许多有三维曲线的空间交错，确保项目无法从单个有利位置来了解。

remMethod.val: inter(在…中间) + lac(线) + e → 使线在中间交叉 → 编织

trans.tranOther: to join together (patterns, fingers, etc) by crossing, as if woven; intertwine
